document_data.name: Moonshae Zinfandel
document_data.mainbody: '''Moonshae Zinfandel''' was a variety of red [[wine]], produced on the [[Moonshae Isles]] by a well-respected [[elf|elvish]] vintner in the mid-to-late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Moonshae Zinfandel was known for its strong taste with notes of [[oak]] and [[spice]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, bottles of Moonshae Zinfandel of certain vintages were collector's items. A set of bottles produced in [[1461 DR]], [[1462 DR]], [[1463 DR]], [[1464 DR]], [[1465 DR]], [[1467 DR]], [[1466 DR]], and [[1475 DR]] belonged to the leader of the infamous [[Guild]] of [[Baldur's Gate]], Nine-Fingers [[Astele Keene]].
